text_block_list.text: The rain that had been falling yesterday stopped in the afternoon, and it was finally time for King Halo's mock race.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Ohh, it's pretty crowded! Well that-s to be expected I guess. That Grass Wonder is gonna be participating!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: The track condition isn't very good cause of the rain… Well, if it's Grass Wonder it shouldn't be a problem. Oh, here she comes!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Good morning. King-chan～. Good luck out there today.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I'll give you the right to challenge me. Grass-san! I'll show you the running of a first-class!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …You came again, huh.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmm… You're more rebellious than I thought.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Well, fine. If you want to see King run so badly I'll entertain you as many times as you like! Ohhohoho!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well, the princess is the same as ever～.
choice_data_list: Did you come to cheer on King Halo too?
Are you here to support King Halo too?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Nyahaha, it's not like that～. I was just free, so I came to kill some time.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: That aside, it looks like it's starting～. We'll probably get scorned if we don't pay attention. so wouldn't it be better to watch properly?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Clear the way! King is coming through!!

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Oh, King Halo came again! Is she good at courses that require power like her mother?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Well, who knows… it's too early to say right now We'll have to watch a bit more-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ha… Ha…! I, have to leave results… as a first class…!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh, this is a rare development for King. During the selection race she was buried in the group, I wonder what changed～?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: But her form is kinda breaking. Like she's putting too much strength into it. Her being too motivated and hard-working isn't anything new though.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: What a waste… She should just run a little freely.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Straight line…! Here she comes. it's Grass Wonder!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Nghhhhh!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What strong power!! She's running in a way that stops her from putting the stress on her legs!! The gap with King just keeps widening…!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ngh. Looks like Grass-chan ended up being the star.
Then, after the race…

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: As expected of Grass Wonder.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It seems she's not accepting scouts right now but… Next Selection Race she's absolutely someone I'd want to talk to.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Right! As for King Halo… well, I suspect she'll start taking a more realistic perspective soon.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ha… Ha… …Ngh!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ohhohoho! I won't give up first next time! Prepare yourself, this isn't all there is to King's running!
As usual, the trainers turn their dismayed faces towards her.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That's right! Pay attention to me and remember this well! I'm King Halo, the first-class horse girl!
No matter how much she loses. how frustrated she gets, or how disappointed. she continues to call herself "first-class". Because, that's the strength of her will.
Then, her trainer should carry the same will!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: …Ha?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Eh?
choice_data_list: That's why I'll scout a first-class horsegirl!
That's why I'll scout a first-class horsegirl!

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Umm… are you okay? Grass Wonder isn't here y'know?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Which would mean… The only one in front of your eyes is King Halo?

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: (Chattering…)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Wait, you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Do you have the iron will to prove King's overwhelming birth-given talent to the world.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: And do you have the determination to rack up countless victories, and make the name "King Halo" roar!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Then, it's decided. Everyone here, listen up!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Just now, the first-class King Halo has decided to pair up with this first-class trainer!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: We'll enter the Twinkle Series, bringing victory to every race. And you'll all watch that glorious journey in awe!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Now, it's a contract. Come with me, trainer!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …You. why would you do such a thing?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: To shout you're a "first-class" while everyone is watching. Do you really understand what you're taking on by doing that?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: To be called a fool with a big mouth, pointed at behind your back, laughed at. But, you can't take back what you've said.
choice_data_list: That's why I have no choice but to become a real first-class.
That's why I have no choice but to become a real first-class.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Hmph, aren't you stupid! You're more rebellious and more clumsy than I expected!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Well, I don't hate it though.
(Bzz! Bzz!)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …It's, mother again.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Eh?…Declare? What?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Ufufu. I don't hate that sort of thing either!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Then, I'm gonna pick up now. You're ready right? One, two…!
And so, my days of aiming to prove I'm first-class with King Halo began.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hello? Mother. I'm not coming home. That aside let me introduce you, listen well. This person is my trainer!
